title: Can I put a lien on my sisters house after loaning her $17,000 in order to keep her home?
question: my sister was about to lose her house to foreclosure,She barrowed $17,000 from me for lawyers and fees in 2014.She has made no effort to pay me back and is about to loose the house again.Can I put a lien on the house to get my money back?
answers: You should have executed a Promissory Note secured by a Deed of Trust against the property. Is there any equity in the property to cover the amount owed to you.
